description: First and second floor rear extension to provide additional (B1) office space
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B1, B24, Replacement UDP Policies 4.1, 4.8. | Notwithstanding the indications given on the drawings the flat roof at first floor level shall not be used to form a balcony or roof terrace or similar amenity area.  REASON:   To protect the living conditions for nearby residential occupiers, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policy B5, Replacement UDP Policies 4.11, 5.9.
